question.title: How to test Android app with Entra ID login (Espresso) and verify data saving on server?
question.body:
I am developing an Android app that uses Microsoft Entra ID login for authentication. After a successful login, the app fetches some user data and also allows saving additional data to the server.

I want to write automated tests for this flow, but I am facing issues:

Since Entra login uses a web view for authentication, Espresso cannot directly interact with it.

After login, I need to verify that data is fetched and that saving data to the server works correctly.

My Questions:

What is the best way to test this login flow with Espresso?

How can I verify that data was saved successfully on the server from an automated test?

A way to test the login flow in Espresso without having to manually enter credentials every time.

After login, verify that user data is fetched successfully.

Test that saving data to the server actually works.
